title: Fling Or Thing?
alternative_title: [성인 단편선] 다시; 썸? ; [용용죽겠지 단편선] 다시; 썸? ; [용용죽겠지 단편선] 다시,썸? ; Again; Some?
status: [성인 단편선] 다시; 썸? ; [용용죽겠지 단편선] 다시; 썸? ; [용용죽겠지 단편선] 다시,썸? ; Again; Some?
description:
Description :
        "Gyo-ha and Jun-oh were once each other's first love, but they eventually broke up due to sexual incompatibility. Ten years later, Gyo-ha, now an investment professional searching for fresh opportunities, stumbles upon a dating app called "AM2"and unexpectedly reconnects with Jun-oh. Wanting more than just nostalgia, Gyo-ha proposes a casual flingan offer Jun-oh eagerly accepts. However, as Jun-oh's feelings grow stronger, he begins to fear that history might repeat itself, and that his affection will only push Gyo-ha further away.Caught between nostalgia and desire, can they truly keep things casual, or will their unresolved emotions threaten to change everything?"
